bibl.title: P. Clackson 48-50. Three Greek Montserrat Texts Related to the Monastery of Apa Apollo.
Monastic Estates in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt. Ostraca, Papyri, and Essays in Memory of Sarah Clackson (P. Clackson)
bibl.author: TORALLAS TOVAR, Sofía

bibl.note: P. Clackson 48 (= P. Monts. Roca Inv. 516). List of payments (e.g. rents or taxes), Hermopolite nome, VIIth-VIIIth century. - 49 (= P. Monts. Roca Inv. 619). Receipt for loaves of bread. Provenance unknown, VIth-VIIth century. - 50 (= P. Monts. Roca Inv. 713). Fragment related to tax collection. Provenance unknown, VIIth-VIIIth century.
TORALLAS TOVAR Sofía and Klaas A. WORP, P. Clackson 48-50. Three Greek Montserrat Texts Related to the Monastery of Apa Apollo.

Anne BOUD'HORS, James CLACKSON, Catherine LOUIS and Petra SIJPESTEIJN (Edited by), Monastic Estates in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt. Ostraca, Papyri, and Essays in Memory of Sarah Clackson (P. Clackson) = American Studies in Papyrology. 46 (Cincinnati, Ohio, 2009) pp. 124-128 et pll. XXII-XXIV.
141.4 P. Monts. Roca Inv. 516 = P. Clackson 48; 619 = P. Clackson 49; 713 = P. Clackson 50
